Question: Iqh3D CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
IQH3D

Product: Glasses-Free 3D Products Premiering at CES 2022

- SKYY 10.8 Glasses-Free 3D Streaming Android Tablet
- SEAA Glasses-Free 3D Smartphone with the first-ever Artificial Intelligence Enabled 3D Camera
- IQH3D - Screens and Monitors - 28"-100" Glasses-Free 3D Multi-Viewer Screens
- IQH3D CMS, Media Player & 2D - 3D Conversion Software Applications
- The 65" Ultra D Monitor
- Devices for viewing 3D content and NFT Stereoscopic Digital Art
- Eye-tracking technology incorporated in some displays
Summary_cn:
IQH3D

2022年国际消费电子展（CES）首次亮相的无眼镜3D产品：
- SKYY 10.8无眼镜3D流媒体安卓平板
- SEAA首款搭载人工智能启用的3D相机的无眼镜3D智能手机
- IQH3D - 屏幕和显示器 - 28英寸至100英寸无眼镜3D多视点屏幕
- IQH3D内容管理系统、媒体播放器及2D-3D转换软件应用
- 65英寸超高清3D显示器
- 用于观看3D内容和NFT立体数字艺术的设备
- 某些显示器配备了眼球追踪技术
